replies.msg:
The people of the world, do you know what happened is going on in Hong Kong? It’s the time in urgent and serious. It’s time we need you to wake up. We need your help. You, the citizen of the world, we need you to join us. You know, we need chaos, to build up a new policy, to build up a new city and place. I have already with a heart of sacrifice to fight for freedom. In a fight to the death to fight with the government, to fight with the Communist Part of China. CPC that is evil and horrible ,Just like the Nazi and demon. I really and really want to win the war so we need more and more power and forces to knock down it. I can tell you, that is the moment we connect the world together. I believe we will win the game and it will go into history.

People should not be afraid of our governments. Governments should be afraid of our people. Let’s get the show moved .

In the final, the other side one, you don’t keep fall in the banality of evil.”Sin’ll encroach self and fear’ll engulf y’all”

“It was you ,and me ,it was all of us.”

See u 4/10 and 5/10

Be water
V.Clown

quote.msg:
The people of the world, do you know what happened is going on in Hong Kong? It’s the time in urgent and serious. It’s time we need you to wake up. We need your help. You, the citizen of the world, we need you to join us. You know, we need chaos, to build up a new policy, to build up a new city and place. I have already with a heart of sacrifice to fight for freedom. In a fight to the death to fight with the government, to fight with the Communist Part of China. CPC that is evil and horrible ,Just like the Nazi and demon. I really and really want to win the war so we need more and more power and forces to knock down it. I can tell you, that is the moment we connect the world together. I believe we will win the game and it will go into history.

People should not be afraid of our governments. Governments should be afraid of our people. Let’s get the show moved .

In the final, the other side one, you don’t keep fall in the banality of evil.”Sin’ll encroach self and fear’ll engulf y’all”

“It was you ,and me ,it was all of us.”

See u 4/10 and 5/10

Be water
V.Clown

replies.msg: 我覺得上面啲內容可以做文宣嘅對外宣言，擴展更多勢力範圍，令更多人覺醒，參與今次嘅示威，將佢成為一個全球行動，反港共。
